projects.title: SermonFlow Mobile App
projects.description:
Full-stack mobile application using React Native and FastAPI, published to iOS App Store. 
Integrated OpenAI API for multi-feature sermon assistance: content expansion, biblical illustration generation, and practical application building. 
Built sermon management system with PDF export capabilities for pastoral workflow optimization.

projects.title: Personal Website

Frontend deployed to Vercel and backend deployed to Render with CI/CD workflows.
